short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take notes for web pages and quickly take a note of anything, anytime. (Syncs to Google Drive)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sometimes we need to take a quick notes of points discussed during any meeting or a call so this extension will help you out there.

Offload your memory by appending notes:
- to a specific website
- to a specific page of that website
- to a specific element of that page
- to any web page matching a defined scope

The features:.
* on any page, you can make note on the web page,
* Ability to add password for each note 
* Nice look and feel.
* Synchronizes across your logged-in browsers.
* Easy to use and check all notes
* Ability to export all notes to CSV file
